name: distended
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
swollen and large in a way that is not normal, especially because of pressure from inside: The television showed images of starving children with distended bellies. His abdomen had become very distended.
More examplesFewer examplesThe left side of his face was grotesquely distended.She had a painfully distended stomach.The distended blood vessels causing the facial redness can be removed with laser therapy.We saw the body of a man who had died two or three days earlier, completely distended.
